entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:55 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.6°C

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 2.
